alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 11:48PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ST. TAMMANY, CENTRAL TANGIPAHOA AND WESTERN WASHINGTON PARISHES THROUGH 1215 AM CST... At 1148 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wilmer to 8 miles northwest of Folsom to near Natalbany. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Franklinton, Independence, Folsom, Natalbany, Enon, Wilmer, and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 33 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Washington
